text:
Best Pizza and subs in the area!  Service is great and this is open late at night.

I have know this place since Tony.  It changed owner since but it is still a very good place to have a nice deli once in a while.

J'aurais mis 3,5 étoiles, mais puisque je ne peux pas, j'arrondis vers le haut! 

Le restaurant Du Collège est un sympathique resto de quartier sans prétentions où l'on sert de la cuisine "canadienne", c'est à dire pas mal de tout. Vous trouverez sur la carte des pizzas, des pâtes, des sous-marins, des poutines, des souvlakis, du poulet, etc. Ce n'est pas de la grande gastronomie, je ne me déplacerais pas pour aller manger là, mais j'habite juste à côté, c'est bon et c'est pas cher (on a payé 30$ pour deux personnes, taxes et pourboire inclus).

Un autre Yelpeur a écrit que ça le rendait nostalgique et c'est exactement le sentiment que j'ai eu aussi en allant manger là. Ça m'a rappelé quand j'allais manger au Zellers avec ma mère et ma grand-mère. J'ai même pris un 7up avec une paille pour me mettre encore plus dans le "mood"!

On a pris une crème de brocoli, une poutine végétarienne (avec des légumes dessus), une pizza végétarienne et un pouding au chocolat pour dessert. Tout était très bon. J'aurais juste préféré du fromage en grains sur la poutine plutôt que du fromage râpé.

Le service est très attentionné. C'est propre. 

Finissez votre repas avec un sundae de chez Leclerc pour une expérience nostalgique complète. J'y retournerai certainement!

A bit nostalgic for me. I use to come here every day after middle school and pick up a Tony Special, which is a terrific italian sandwich. They make decent food here, I actually really like their club sandwich.

Ordered a very late dinner at 1:25 am, on a night shift at work , thought i was going to starve through the night, but this restaurant saved my life, very decent food and good service , though they forgot my drink they still are worthy a 4 star rating cause they opened late just what desperately needed.

Good price for the amount of food however I asked for no fruits because I'm ALLERGIC and something else to replace it like bacon I don't mind paying extra he said yeah repeated the order to me and I got a plate with fruits so I had to throw it out don't want to waste their time- it was a delivery during a storm. money comes and goes but I hope they be careful next time because i have a sever allergic reaction and it would suck if something like this happened again

The most disgusting thing I ever ordered for such a high price !!!!!
I ordered from there thinking they were saving me it was so disgusting, a burned and dry Poutine , a bacon cheeseburger with no sauce and the bacon gone missing !!!! Don't waste your time and order from here !! Just order somewhere else or sleep on an empty stomach. Trust me you are better off !!

Not the best but does the trick. I'll pick up breakfast before work or sometimes we'll have delivery for lunch. Clean kitchen, nice chef and friendly staff. Price is fine, so is the food. Really one of those nothing special kinda places that comes in handy at the right moment, particularly for the two colleges down the street.

Was very happy to have found this place on Google while looking for somewhere that would deliver to my hotel near the airport.  There was very little around the area, and among the places that offered delivery AND were open late, this was pretty much the only option going.  Ordered meals twice during my stay at the hotel and was very impressed with the quality of the food.  Had the fried calamari, Western pizza, and tried two different kinds of pasta.  Also the best garlic bread I have ever had. Impressive menu selection.
